line_1: Alarm'd! — he listens to the crash
line_2: Wild raves the wind, the arrowy light'nings flash,

line_1: On the pain'd ear-drum bursts the sudden crash,
line_2: Starts the red flame, and Death pursues the flash. —

line_1: Heard the first murmur; while he waits the crash,
line_2: And dreads to see the etherial meteors flash.
